markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Camouflage](/Feats.aspx?ID=4887) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 161 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=73) (Level 12), [Knight Reclaimant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=28) (Level 12), [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=261) (Level 12), [Verduran Shadow](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=312) (Level 12)

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

You alter your appearance to blend in to the wilderness. In natural terrain, you can Hide and Sneak even without cover or being concealed.

<title level="2">Camouflage leads to...</title>
[Shadow Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=4911), [Stealthy Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=4900)
name: Camouflage
